Api.User

Documentation

type UserAPI = Get `[JSON]` [UserRead] :<|> ((Capture "email" Email :> Get `[JSON]` (Maybe UserRead)) :<|> (("verify" :> (ReqBody `[JSON]` UserWrite :> Post `[JSON]` Bool)) :<|> (ReqBody `[JSON]` UserWrite :> Post `[JSON]` Int64)))

userAPI :: Proxy UserAPI

userServer :: ServerT UserAPI AppM

getUsers :: AppM [UserRead]

getUserByEmail :: Email -> AppM (Maybe UserRead)

verifyUser :: UserWrite -> AppM Bool

postUser :: UserWrite -> AppM Int64
